data.title: Detailed examination of the elements or structure of A.C.A, typically as a basis for discussion or interpretation.
data.caption:
The Agency’s stakeholders will play a critical role in the effective implementation of its mandate. Every effort will be made to cultivate a long-term mutually beneficial relationship. 
This relationship is based on both assigned responsibility and mutual benefit, hence the identification of expectations from both parties in terms of activities and anticipated results as outlined below.

data.title: Two way expectations between ACA, Government and Government Agencies
data.caption:
Stakeholder. 
 Government & Government Agencies 
 
 Stakeholder Expectations 
 * Implement its Strategic Plan in accordance with the Kenya Vision 2030. 
* Enforcement of the Act. 
 * Public awareness on counterfeiting. 
 * Enhanced revenue collection 
 * Creation of employment opportunities 
 * Attract and sustain domestic and foreign investment 
 * Develop and implement training programs on counterfeits 
 * Create partnerships with national, regional and international enforcement agencies. 
 * Good corporate governance 

 Aca Expectations Of Stakeholders 
 * Funding 
 * Policy guidelines and support. 
 * Legislative representation

data.title: Government Enforcement Agency as stakeholders
data.caption:
# Stakeholder Expectations 

 * Coordination of anti-counterfeit strategies and activities. 
 * Cooperation in investigation & enforcement. 
 * Intelligence sharing. 
 * Public awareness of Agency’s mandate and functions 

 # Aca Expectations Of Stakeholders 

 * Funding 
 * Policy guidelines and support 
 * Legislative representation

data.title: Manufacturers, Dealers and Agents as stakeholders
data.caption:
# Stakeholder Expectations 

 * Effective enforcement of the Act 
 * Public awareness 
 * Protection of intellectual property rights thereby protecting local and 
 * International trade and investments 
 * Creation of strong linkages 

 # Aca Expectations Of Stakeholders 

 * Resource support 
 * Intelligence 
 * Training and capacity building 
 * Awareness creation

data.title: Consumer and Consumer Organizations as stakeholders
data.caption:
# Stakeholder Expectations 

 * Enforcement of the Act 
 * Awareness programs 
 * Consumer protection in accordance with the constitution 

 # Aca Expectations Of Stakeholders 

 * Intelligence 
 * Creating awareness

data.title: Development partners as stakeholders
data.caption:
# Stakeholder Expectations 

 * Enforcement of the Act 
 * Compliance with good governance, principles and procedures 
 * Awareness creation 
 * Develop and implement training programs on counterfeits 
 
 # Stakeholder Expectations 

 * Resource support 
 * Intelligence 
 * International linkages 
 * Training and awareness

data.title: Board of Directors as stakeholders
data.caption:
# Stakeholder Expectations 

 * Performance 
 * Good corporate governance 
 * Good ethical practices 
 * Develop a Board manual and related code of conduct 

 # Stakeholder Expectations 

 * Policy guidance and support 
 * Resource mobilization 
 * Staff motivation 
 * Adherence to Board manual

data.title: Staff as Stakeholders
data.caption:
# Stakeholder Expectations 

 * Develop a human resource manual and code of conduct 
 * Capacity building 
 * Conducive working environment 

 # Stakeholder Expectations 
 * Performance as per the Agency’s expectations 
 * Regular management reports to the Board 
 * Adhering to the Agency’s code of conduct and other internal policies
